responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "642DE0934CDE26C8AB472C9634665312", "These odd gems - you\'re not the only one to have brought one to my attention. If I\'ve read these correctly, they hold wishes and intentions - but these have been tainted. I think they\'ve become dangerous to carry around freely. There is power here, old magic from the time before the apocalypse. Each of these stones carries an enigma all its own. May I add yours to my collection? The Nine grant me the courage to plumb their secrets! ")
name: ANV_FTUE_BF_NPC_RunesingerNaho_10_Response
